description: This is the statistics page consisting of the sunb_bio_molecules, venn_glycan_species, sunb_glycan_type_subtype, sunb_glycan_organism_type, donut_motif, bar_mass_ranges, bar_sugar_ranges, sunb_canon_isof_prot, venn_protein_homo, venn_protein_mus, venn_protein_rat, pie_glycohydrolases_prot, pie_glycosyltransferases_prot, and sunb_glycoprot_rep_pred_glyc charts, bars, and diagrams.

sunb_bio_molecules.description: This is sunb_bio_molecules sunburst of the  proteins and glycans molecules consisting of the name, children_glycan, and children_protein.

name.description: This is the name of the BioMolecules sunburst

children_glycan.description: Glycan children of the BioMolecules sunburst.

items.description: This are the children of the glycan contain organism, name, and children.

organism.description: This glycan organism by species contain organism_list and operation.

items.description: This is the glycan organism_list items contain id and name.

id.description: The value can be a NCBI Taxonomy ID.

name.description: The string contain the scientific name of the organism.

operation.description: Specifies type of operation to perform. Use OR.

name.description: The Name of the glycan organism by species.

children.description: The Children of the glycan organism.

items.description: The Children of the human or mouse or rat glycan contain organism, glycan_type, name, and size.

organism.description: The glycan organism contain organism_list and operation.

items.description: This is the organism_list items contain id and name. In this case it has only one set of id and name.

id.description: The value can be a NCBI Taxonomy ID.

name.description: The value can be a scientific species name.

operation.description: Specifies type of operation to perform. Use OR.

name.description: The Name of glycan type.

children_protein.description: Protein children of the BioMolecules sunburst.

items.description: This are the children of the protein contain organism, name, size, and children.

organism.description: Protein organism by species contain id and name.

id.description: The value can be a NCBI Taxonomy ID.

name.description: The string contain the scientific name of the organism.
The name of protein organism. A name displayed by a tooltip on mouseover.

size.description: The size of protein by species. A size displayed by a tooltip on mouseover.

children.description: The Children of the protein by species.

items.description: The children of protein by species contain name and size.

name.description: The name of protein children. Leave it empty.

size.description: The Size of protein children. Leave it zero.

items.description: The Venn glycan species diagram contain sets, tooltipname, organism, name, and size.

sets.description: Sets represent each glycan species as a circle and their relations with each other.

items.description: [0] - Human glycans, [1] - Mouse glycans, [2] - Rat glycans, [0 1] - Human & Mouse glycans,  [0 2] - Human & Rat glycans, [1 2] - Mouse & Rat glycans, [0 1 2] - Human & Mouse & Rat glycans.

tooltipname.description: The Tooltipname displayed on a mouseover on each set.

organism.description: The glycan organism contain organism_list and operation.

items.description: This is the organism_list items contain id and name. In this case it can contain more than one set of id and name by species.

id.description: The value can be a NCBI Taxonomy ID.

name.description: The value can be a scientific species name.

operation.description: Specifies type of operation to perform. If organism_list contain more than one sets ofid and name than use operation: AND. Sets [0, 1], [0, 2], [1, 2], and [0, 1, 2] has operation: AND.

name.description: The Name displayed as a label for each circle (glycan species).

size.description: The size represents the circle of each glycan species and its relations to one another.

sunb_glycan_type_subtype.description: This is sunb_glycan_type_subtype sunburst of the statistics glycan types and subtypes consisting of the name and children.

name.description: This is the glycan name. Leave it empty.

children.description: List of glycan types and subtypes.

items.description: The glycan type contain name, and children.

name.description: The Name of glycan type

items.description: The glycan subtype consist of name and size

name.description: The Name of glycan subtype.

size.description: The Size of each glycan subtype.

sunb_glycan_organism_type.description: This is sunb_glycan_organism_type glycan type by species sunburst of the statistics consisting of the name and children.

name.description: This is a sunburst name. Leave it empty.

children.description: The list of glycan organisms and types.

items.description: This are the children of the glycan contain organism, name, and children.

organism.description: This glycan organism contain organism_list and operation.

items.description: This is the organism_list items contain id and name. In this case it has only one set of id and name.

id.description: The value can be a NCBI Taxonomy ID.

name.description: The string contain the scientific name of the organism.

operation.description: Specifies type of operation to perform. Use OR.

name.description: The name of glycan species.

children.description: The children of glycan species (glycan type).

items.description: The children of glycan species contain organism, glycan type, name, and size.

organism.description: The glycan organism contain organism_list and operation.

items.description: This is the organism_list items contain id and name.

id.description: The value can be a NCBI Taxonomy ID.

name.description: The scientific species name.

operation.description: Specifies type of operation to perform.

name.description: Tooltip name displayed on mouseover. The Name of glycan type by species.

donut_motif.description: This is donut_motif glycan motif donut chart.

items.description: The items of the glycan motif donut chart contain name and size.

name.description: This is a scientific name of motif.

size.description: This is a size of motif.

bar_mass_ranges.description: The bar chart of a glycan mass ranges contain stepsize and data.

stepsize.description: The Stepsize represents the number of glycans of a 50Da mass range for each bar. In this bar chart it is equals to 50.

data.description: The data represents frequency of each bar.

items.description: The frequency data for every mass range.

bar_sugar_ranges.description: The bar chart of a glycan sugar ranges contain stepsize and data.

stepsize.description: The stepsize represents the number of glycans with a certain amount of residues. In this bar chart it is equals to 1.

data.description: The data represents frequency of resedue.

items.description: Frequency of every resedue.

sunb_canon_isof_prot.description: This is sunburst of canononical proteins and isoforms consisting of the name and children.

name.description: This is a sunburst name. Leave it empty.

items.description: Protein organism contain of organism, name, and children.

organism.description: Protein organism by species contain id and name.

id.description: The value can be a NCBI Taxonomy ID.

name.description: The string contain the scientific name of the organism.
The name of protein organism. A name displayed by a tooltip on mouseover.

children.description: The protein type (canonical protein and isoforms) for every organism.

items.description: The protein type (canonical protein and isoforms) for every organism contain organism, name, and size.

organism.description: The organism of canonical protein and isoforms contain id and name.

id.description: The value can be a NCBI Taxonomy ID.

name.description: The string contain the scientific name of the organism.
The name of canonical and isoform species. A name displayed by a tooltip on mouseover.

size.description: The size of canonical or Isoforms by species. A size displayed by a tooltip on mouseover.

venn_protein_homo.description: The Venn diagram of the homo protein.

items.description: The Venn diagram of the homo protein contain sets, tooltipname, name, and size.

sets.description: Sets represent each molecule (protein, enzyme, glycoprotein) by species as a circle and their relations with each other.

items.description: All molecules (protein, enzyme, glycoprotein) and their relation with each other defind as a set.

tooltipname.description: The Tooltipname displayed on a mouseover for each set.

name.description: The name displayed on venn diagram. For sets [1], [2], [3] assign names 'Proteins', 'Enzymes', 'Glycoproteins' accordingly. For sets [0, 1], [0, 2], [0, 1, 2] leave name as an empty string. This is very important!

size.description: The size of every molecule set. Shapes the venn diagram and displayed on tooltip.

organism.description: Protein organism by species contain id and name.

id.description: The value can be a NCBI Taxonomy ID.

name.description: The string contain the scientific name of the organism.

venn_protein_mus.description: The Venn diagram of the mus protein.

items.description: The Venn diagram of the mus protein contain sets, tooltipname, name, and size.

sets.description: Sets represent each molecule (protein, enzyme, glycoprotein) by species as a circle and their relations with each other.

items.description: All molecules (protein, enzyme, glycoprotein) and their relation with each other defind as a set.

tooltipname.description: The Tooltipname displayed on a mouseover for each set.

name.description: The name displayed on venn diagram. For sets [1], [2], [3] assign names 'Proteins', 'Enzymes', 'Glycoproteins' accordingly. For sets [0, 1], [0, 2], [0, 1, 2] leave name as an empty string. This is very important!

size.description: The size of every molecule set. Shapes the venn diagram and displayed on tooltip.

organism.description: Protein organism by species contain id and name.

id.description: The value can be a NCBI Taxonomy ID.

name.description: The string contain the scientific name of the organism.

venn_protein_rat.description: The Venn diagram of the rat protein.

items.description: The Venn diagram of the homo protein contain sets, tooltipname, name, and size.

sets.description: Sets represent each molecule (protein, enzyme, glycoprotein) by species as a circle and their relations with each other.

items.description: All molecules (protein, enzyme, glycoprotein) and their relation with each other defind as a set.

tooltipname.description: The Tooltipname displayed on a mouseover for each set.

name.description: The name displayed on venn diagram. For sets [1], [2], [3] assign names 'Proteins', 'Enzymes', 'Glycoproteins' accordingly. For sets [0, 1], [0, 2], [0, 1, 2] leave name as an empty string. This is very important!

size.description: The size of every molecule set. Shapes the venn diagram and displayed on tooltip.

organism.description: Protein organism by species contain id and name.

id.description: The value can be a NCBI Taxonomy ID.

name.description: The string contain the scientific name of the organism.

items.description: The glycohydrolases proteins pie chart contain organism, name, and size.

organism.description: The protein organism contain id and name.

id.description: The value can be a NCBI Taxonomy ID.

name.description: The string contain the scientific name of the organism.
The species name.

items.description: The glycosyltransferases proteins pie chart contain organism, name, and size.

organism.description: The protein organism contain id and name.

id.description: The value can be a NCBI Taxonomy ID.

name.description: The string contain the scientific name of the organism.
The species name.

sunb_glycoprot_rep_pred_glyc.description: The glycoproteins with reported with glycan or without glycans and predicted glycans sunburst by species contain name and children.

name.description: The name of sunburst. Leave it empty.

children.description: The children are proteins by species.

items.description: The proteins by species contain name and children.

name.description: The Name of protein by species.

children.description: The children of protein by species represent reported with glycan structure RWGS, reported without glycan structure RWOGS, and reported glycans.

items.description: Each protein child contain organism, name, and size.

organism.description: The protein organism contain id and name.

id.description: The value can be a NCBI Taxonomy ID.

name.description: The string contain the scientific name of the organism.
The Name of protein's children by species. Displayed by tooltip. RWGS - Reported With Glycan Structures, RWOGS - Reported WithOut Glycan Structures.

size.description: The size of protein's children by species.
